verses.verse: Now <S%G2532><s%> on the first <S%G3391><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> very early <S%G3722><s%> in the morning, they came <S%G2064><s%> to the sepulcher, <S%G3418><s%> bringing <S%G5342><s%> the spices <S%G759><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they had prepared, <S%G2090><s%> and certain others with them.
And they found <S%G2147><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> rolled <S%G617><s%> away <S%G617><s%> from the sepulcher. <S%G3419><s%>
And they entered <S%G1525><s%> in, and found <S%G2147><s%> not the body <S%G4983><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as they were much <S%G1280><s%> perplexed <S%G1280><s%> thereabout, <S%G4012><s%> <S%G5127><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G435><s%> stood <S%G2186><s%> by them in shining <S%G797><s%> garments: <S%G2067><s%>

And as they were afraid, <S%G1719><s%> and bowed <S%G2827><s%> down their faces <S%G4383><s%> to the earth, <S%G1093><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> you the living <S%G2198><s%> among <S%G3326><s%> the dead? <S%G3498><s%>
He is not here, <S%G5602><s%> but is risen: <S%G1453><s%> remember <S%G3415><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> he spoke <S%G2980><s%> to you when he was yet <S%G2089><s%> in Galilee, <S%G1056><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be delivered <S%G3860><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> of sinful <S%G268><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> and be crucified, <S%G4717><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>
And they remembered <S%G3415><s%> his words, <S%G4487><s%>

And returned <S%G5290><s%> from the sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things to the eleven, <S%G1733><s%> and to all <S%G3956><s%> the rest. <S%G3062><s%>

It was Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%>and Joanna, <S%G2489><s%> and Mary <S%G3137><s%> the mother of James, <S%G2385><s%> and other <S%G3062><s%> women that were with them, which <S%G3739><s%> told <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things to the apostles. <S%G652><s%>
And their words <S%G4487><s%> seemed <S%G5316><s%> to them as idle <S%G3026><s%> tales, <S%G3026><s%> and they believed <S%G569><s%> them not.

Then <S%G1161><s%> arose <S%G450><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and ran <S%G5143><s%> to the sepulcher; <S%G3419><s%> and stooping <S%G3879><s%> down, <S%G3879><s%> he beheld <S%G991><s%> the linen <S%G3608><s%> clothes <S%G3608><s%> laid <S%G2749><s%> by themselves, <S%G3441><s%> and departed, <S%G565><s%> wondering <S%G2296><s%> in himself <S%G1438><s%> at that which was come <S%G1096><s%> to pass.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of them went <S%G4198><s%> that same <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> to a village <S%G2968><s%> called <S%G3686><s%> Emmaus, <S%G1695><s%> which was from Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> about three score <S%G1835><s%> furlongs. <S%G4712><s%>
And they talked <S%G3656><s%> together <S%G4314><s%> <S%G240><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> things which had happened. <S%G4819><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> they communed <S%G3656><s%> together and reasoned, <S%G4802><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> drew near, <S%G1448><s%> and went <S%G4848><s%> with them.
But their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were held <S%G2902><s%> that they should not know <S%G1921><s%> him.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, What <S%G5101><s%> manner of communications <S%G3056><s%> are these <S%G3778><s%> that you have <S%G474><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> as you walk, <S%G4043><s%> and are sad? <S%G4659><s%>

And the one <S%G1520><s%> of them, whose <S%G3739><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was Cleopas, <S%G2810><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Are you only <S%G3441><s%> a stranger <S%G3939><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and have not known <S%G1097><s%> the things which are come <S%G1096><s%> to pass there <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> in these <S%G5025><s%> days? <S%G2250><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, What <S%G4169><s%> things? And they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was a prophet <S%G4396><s%> mighty <S%G1415><s%> in deed <S%G2041><s%> and word <S%G3056><s%> before <S%G1726><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the people: <S%G2992><s%>

And how <S%G3704><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and our rulers <S%G758><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> him to be condemned <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2917><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%> and have <S%G474><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%> him.

But we trusted <S%G1679><s%> that it had been <S%G2076><s%> he which should <S%G3195><s%> have <S%G474><s%> redeemed <S%G3084><s%> Israel: <S%G2474><s%> and beside <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> this, <S%G5125><s%> to day <S%G4594><s%> is the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> since <S%G575><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things were done. <S%G1096><s%>

Yes, <S%G235><s%> and certain <S%G5100><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of our company made <S%G1839><s%> us astonished, <S%G1839><s%> which were early <S%G3721><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the sepulcher; <S%G3419><s%>

And when they found <S%G2147><s%> not his body, <S%G4983><s%> they came, <S%G2064><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> that they had also <S%G2532><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> a vision <S%G3701><s%> of angels, <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> that he was alive. <S%G2198><s%>

And certain <S%G5100><s%> of them which were with us went <S%G565><s%> to the sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> it even <S%G3779><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> as the women <S%G1135><s%> had said: <S%G2036><s%> but him they saw <S%G1492><s%> not.

Then <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, O fools, <S%G453><s%> and slow <S%G1021><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> to believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that the prophets <S%G4396><s%> have spoken: <S%G2980><s%>
Ought <S%G1163><s%> not Christ <S%G5547><s%> to have suffered <S%G3958><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, and to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his glory? <S%G1391><s%>

And beginning <S%G756><s%> at <S%G575><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> he expounded <S%G1329><s%> to them in all <S%G3956><s%> the scriptures <S%G1124><s%> the things concerning <S%G4012><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>
And they drew near <S%G1448><s%> to the village, <S%G2968><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> they went: <S%G4198><s%> and he made <S%G4364><s%> as though he would have gone <S%G4198><s%> further. <S%G4206><s%>

But they constrained <S%G3849><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Abide <S%G3306><s%> with us: for it is toward <S%G4314><s%> evening, <S%G2073><s%> and the day <S%G2250><s%> is far spent. <S%G2827><s%> And he went <S%G1525><s%> in to tarry <S%G3306><s%> with them.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as he sat <S%G2625><s%> at <S%G2625><s%> meat with them, he took <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and blessed <S%G2127><s%> it, and broke, <S%G2806><s%> and gave <S%G1929><s%> to them.
And their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were opened, <S%G1272><s%> and they knew <S%G1921><s%> him; and he vanished <S%G1096><s%> <S%G855><s%> out of their sight.

And they said <S%G2036><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> Did not our heart <S%G2588><s%> burn <S%G2545><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> us, while <S%G5613><s%> he talked <S%G2980><s%> with us by the way, <S%G3598><s%> and while <S%G5613><s%> he opened <S%G1272><s%> to us the scriptures? <S%G1124><s%>

And they rose <S%G450><s%> up the same <S%G846><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and returned <S%G5290><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> the eleven <S%G1733><s%> gathered <S%G4867><s%> together, <S%G4867><s%> and them that were with them,
Saying, <S%G3004><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> is risen <S%G1453><s%> indeed, <S%G3689><s%> and has appeared <S%G3700><s%> to Simon. <S%G4613><s%>
And they told <S%G1834><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> things were done in the way, <S%G3598><s%> and how <S%G5613><s%> he was known <S%G1097><s%> of them in breaking <S%G2800><s%> of bread. <S%G740><s%>

And as they thus <S%G3778><s%> spoke, <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of them, and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you.
But they were terrified <S%G4422><s%> and affrighted, <S%G1719><s%> and supposed <S%G1380><s%> that they had seen <S%G2334><s%> a spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> are you troubled? <S%G5015><s%> and why <S%G1302><s%> do thoughts <S%G1261><s%> arise <S%G305><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts? <S%G2588><s%>

Behold <S%G1492><s%> my hands <S%G5495><s%> and my feet, <S%G4228><s%> that it is I myself: handle <S%G5584><s%> me, and see; <S%G1492><s%> for a spirit <S%G4151><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> not flesh <S%G4561><s%> and bones, <S%G3747><s%> as you see <S%G2334><s%> me have. <S%G2192><s%>
And when he had thus <S%G5124><s%> spoken, <S%G2036><s%> he showed <S%G1925><s%> them his hands <S%G5495><s%> and his feet. <S%G4228><s%>

And while they yet <S%G2089><s%> believed <S%G569><s%> not for joy, <S%G5479><s%> and wondered, <S%G2296><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Have <S%G2192><s%> you here <S%G1759><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> meat? <S%G1034><s%>
And they gave <S%G1929><s%> him a piece <S%G3313><s%> of a broiled <S%G3702><s%> fish, <S%G2486><s%> and of an honeycomb. <S%G3193><s%> <S%G2781><s%>
And he took <S%G2983><s%> it, and did eat <S%G5315><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> them.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, These <S%G3778><s%> are the words <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I spoke <S%G2980><s%> to you, while I was yet <S%G2089><s%> with you, that all <S%G3956><s%> things must <S%G1163><s%> be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were written <S%G1125><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> and in the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and in the psalms, <S%G5568><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> me.
Then <S%G5119><s%> opened <S%G1272><s%> he their understanding, <S%G3563><s%> that they might understand <S%G4920><s%> the scriptures, <S%G1124><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Thus <S%G3779><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> and thus <S%G3779><s%> it behooved <S%G1163><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to suffer, <S%G3958><s%> and to rise <S%G450><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day: <S%G2250><s%>

And that repentance <S%G3341><s%> and remission <S%G859><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%> should be preached <S%G2784><s%> in his name <S%G3686><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> beginning <S%G756><s%> at <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>
And you are witnesses <S%G3144><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> things.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of my Father <S%G3962><s%> on you: but tarry <S%G2523><s%> you in the city <S%G4172><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> you be endued <S%G1746><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%> from on high. <S%G5311><s%>
And he led <S%G1806><s%> them out as far <S%G2193><s%> as to Bethany, <S%G963><s%> and he lifted <S%G1869><s%> up his hands, <S%G5495><s%> and blessed <S%G2127><s%> them.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> he blessed <S%G2127><s%> them, he was parted <S%G1339><s%> from them, and carried <S%G399><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
And they worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him, and returned <S%G5290><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> joy: <S%G5479><s%>
And were continually <S%G1725><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> praising <S%G134><s%> and blessing <S%G2127><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
